Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Allows signatures secured through blockchain technology to be considered an electronic signature
Summary: Relates to allowing signatures, records and contracts secured through blockchain technology to be considered in an electronic form and to be an electronic record and signature; allows smart contracts to exist in commerce.
LawCode: Amd ยง302, add ยง310, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state technology law, in relation to blockchain technology and smart contracts
